void USART_DeInit (HT_USART_TypeDef *USARTx)
 Deinitialize the USART/UART peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void USART_Init (HT_USART_TypeDef *USARTx, USART_InitTypeDef *USART_InitStruct)
 Initialize the USART/UART peripheral according to the specified parameters in the USART_InitStruct.
void USART_StructInit (USART_InitTypeDef *USART_InitStruct)
 Fill each USART_InitStruct member with its default value.

 Enable or Disable the USART/UART stick parity function.

 Set the USART FIFO time-out value.

Function Documentation

void USART_ClearFlag ( HT_USART_TypeDef *  USARTx,
u32  USART_Flag 
)

Clear the specified USART/UART flags.

Parameters:
USARTx,:where USARTx is the selected USART/UART from the USART/UART peripherals.
USART_Flag,:Specify the flag to check. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • USART_FLAG_OE :
  • USART_FLAG_PE :
  • USART_FLAG_FE :
  • USART_FLAG_BI :
  • USART_FLAG_TOUT :
  • USART_FLAG_RSADD :
  • USART_FLAG_CTSC :
  • USART_FLAG_LBD :
Return values:
SETor RESET

Deinitialize the USART/UART peripheral registers to their default reset values.

Parameters:
USARTx,:Parameter to select the UxART peripheral.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 92 of file ht32f5xxxx_usart.c.

void USART_FIFOReset ( HT_USART_TypeDef *  USARTx,
u32  USART_FIFODirection 
)

Clear both the write and read point in USART Tx FIFO or Rx FIFO.

Parameters:
USARTx,:Parameter to select the USART peripheral.
USART_FIFODirection,:Determine TX FIFO or Rx FIFO that is to be reset. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • USART_FIFO_TX
  • USART_FIFO_RX
Return values:
None

NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.

Definition at line 447 of file ht32f5xxxx_usart.c.

u8 USART_GetFIFOStatus ( HT_USART_TypeDef *  USARTx,
u32  USART_FIFODirection 
)

Return the status of specified USART FIFO.

Parameters:
USARTx,:Parameter to select the USART peripheral.
USART_FIFODirection,:specify the FIFO that is to be check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • USART_FIFO_TX
  • USART_FIFO_RX
Return values:
Thenumber of data in Tx FIFO or Rx FIFO.

FlagStatus USART_GetFlagStatus ( HT_USART_TypeDef *  USARTx,
u32  USART_FLAG_x 
)

Get the specified USART/UART status flags.

Parameters:
USARTx,:Parameter to select the UxART peripheral.
USART_FLAG_x,:Specify the flag to be check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • USART_FLAG_RXDNE :
  • USART_FLAG_OE :
  • USART_FLAG_PE :
  • USART_FLAG_FE :
  • USART_FLAG_BI :
  • USART_FLAG_RXDR :
  • USART_FLAG_TOUT :
  • USART_FLAG_TXDE :
  • USART_FLAG_TXC :
  • USART_FLAG_RSADD :
  • USART_FLAG_CTSC :
  • USART_FLAG_CTSS :
  • USART_FLAG_LBD :
Return values:
SETor RESET

u32  USART_INT_x

Parameters:

  • USART_INT_CTS :

void USART_IntConfig ( HT_USART_TypeDef *  USARTx,
u32  USART_INT_x,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the USART/UART interrupts.

Parameters:
USARTx,:Parameter to select the UxART peripheral.
USART_INT_x,:Specify if the USART/UART interrupt source to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • USART_INT_RXDR :
  • USART_INT_TXDE :
  • USART_INT_TXC :
  • USART_INT_OE :
  • USART_INT_PE :
  • USART_INT_FE :
  • USART_INT_BI :
  • USART_INT_RSADD :
  • USART_INT_TOUT :
  • USART_INT_CTS :
  • USART_INT_LBD :
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.

Definition at line 397 of file ht32f5xxxx_usart.c.

void USART_TXRXTLConfig ( HT_USART_TypeDef *  USARTx,
u32  TxRx,
u32  USART_tl 
)

Configure the Tx/Rx FIFO Interrupt Trigger Level.

Parameters:
USARTx,:Parameter to select the USART peripheral.
TxRx,:This parameter can be USART_CMD_TX or USART_CMD_RX.
USART_tl,:Specify the USART Tx/Rx FIFO interrupt trigger level. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • USART_RXTL_01
  • USART_RXTL_02
  • USART_RXTL_04
  • USART_RXTL_06
  • USART_TXTL_00
  • USART_TXTL_02
  • USART_TXTL_04
  • USART_TXTL_06
Return values:
None
